Description.Text: The puzzle pack features a simple grid of blocks. The camera is positioned overhead of the blocks. The user can interact with these blocks by clicking using either the mouse or touch screen. When a block is clicked its color changes and a score, which shown using a text component within the level is increased.
퍼즐 팩은 단순한 블록 모눈을 특징으로 합니다. 카메라는 블록 위에 위치해 있습니다. 사용자는 이 블록을 마우스나 터치스크린으로 클릭하여 상호작용할 수 있습니다. 블록을 클릭하면 색이 바뀌며, 레벨에 텍스트 컴포넌트를 사용하여 표시되는 점수가 올라갑니다.

The puzzle pack features a simple grid of blocks. The camera is positioned overhead of the blocks. The user can interact with these blocks by clicking using either the mouse or touch screen. When a block is clicked its color changes and a score, which shown using a text component within the level is increased.

AssetTypes.Text: スタティックメッシュ

ClassTypes: Actor, PlayerController, SceneComponent, TextRenderComponent, StaticMeshComponent, MaterialInstance, PrimitiveComponent
